name: Heart of the Home Perceptions of My Past

metadata.name: Heart of the Home No. 1
metadata.description:
This body of work is centered around what I see as the heart of the contemporary American home; the refrigerator. Refrigerators serve as objects of insight into individuals and families' lives, social dynamics, and cultural backgrounds. 

Heart of the Home No. 1 is a digitally painted recreation of the artists physical sculpture during its debut gallery showing.
